channel.title: Toolboxes on Docker Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Toolboxes on Docker Docs

item.title: Docker Toolbox
item.description:
Toolbox

Available for both Windows and Mac, Docker Toolbox installs the Docker Client, Machine, Compose, and Kitematic.

Learn about Docker Toolbox. See Docker Toolbox Overview for a quick tour of how to install Toolbox, and get started with Docker Machine, Kitematic, and Docker Compose.

Ready to download Toolbox? Download Docker Toolbox from products.

item.title: Toolbox Overview
item.description:
Docker Toolbox Overview

Docker Toolbox is an installer for quick setup and launch of a Docker environment on Mac and Windows systems.

What’s in the box

Toolbox includes these Docker tools:

  • Docker Machine for running docker-machine commands

  • Docker Engine for running the docker commands

  • Docker Compose for running the docker-compose commands

  • Kitematic, the Docker GUI

  • a shell preconfigured for a Docker command-line environment

  • Oracle VirtualBox

Ready to get started?

Download Docker Toolbox from the product page.

Next Steps

  • Get Started with Docker for Mac OS X

  • Get Started with Docker for Windows

  • Learn about Kitematic

  • Learn about Docker Machine

  • Learn about Docker Compose
